references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which underpins the core methodology of the current research.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image generation, influencing the choice of diffusion models in the current work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a key model used in the current research for image generation, showcasing its effectiveness in generating high-quality images.
This paper introduces classifier-free guidance, a crucial technique used in the current research to improve the quality and controllability of generated images and spectrograms.

references.paper_title: Auffusion: Leveraging the power of diffusion and large language models for text-to-audio generation
references.reason: This paper introduces Auffusion, a model specifically designed for text-to-audio generation using diffusion models, which is directly leveraged and adapted in the current research.
